hero.name: Duygu Altunay
hero.tagline: I build web & mobile projects. I turn ideas into digital experiences.

about.title: About
about.body: As a Computer Engineer, I develop high-performance and sustainable software solutions. With an analytical mindset and a disciplined work ethic, I aim to design reliable and scalable systems by planning and managing projects end-to-end.

bullets: Observed and contributed to corporate infrastructure systems and software solutions.
Gained experience in data security, system optimization, and network management.
Worked on digital content production and supported web & mobile development workflows.
Delivered design-oriented solutions including video editing and animation outputs.
Focused on user experience and visual consistency across platforms.
Supported software projects within the IT department.
Learned corporate project management and software testing practices.
Contributed to team coordination and delivery processes.
Deliver end-to-end projects across mobile apps, websites, desktop software, and media production.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have a project idea? Let's talk.
